reviewText: Movie stated freezing the last third of the movie.  Not happy with it. Was looking forward to watching this.  Disappointed

This would have been hard to find utill amazon had it. This was a gift and I know the persons will be bless by this when they get it. It came in timely and was packaged well, overall I am pleased by the seller and would buy from them again.

Me encanto que me llego el DVD en creo fueron 2 o 3 dias fue lo mejor . Llega super rapido y se ve muy bien la pelicula de por si esta pelicula es hermosa me encanto y eso que a mi no me llamaban la atencion estas peliculas pero esta historia esta hermosa hasta chille :).. Definitivamente la recomiendo
THIS MOVIES ABOUT TRUE LOVE WAS EXCELLENT. CRIED ALOT THROUGH THIS MOVIE.BROUGHT BACK MEMORIES OF WHEN I WAS A CHILD WATCHING IT WITH MY PARENTS. GREW UP WATCHING ALL OF VICENTE FERNANDEZ'S MOVIES.

The DVD was scratched and very poor picture quality.  I tried to clean and fix it with an antiscratch device I brought at electronic store but sadly it didn't repair the DVD movie.  I guess it was beyond fixing.  Sad because I really wanted to see this classic movie which I haven't seen since my childhood.

Enjoyed the movie until the dvd froze. Of course this would happen at the best part and almost the end. Will not buy movies from here again.
